melesa mewani thaththwayaka sitina pudgalika anshaye sewaka, sewikawanwan nishpadana ha sewa kshetha්rayanhi miliyana 08 k pamana wana athara, ema sewaka, sewikawan da me janadhipathiwaranaye chandadayakayin baw awadharanaya karamin ema sewaka sewikawan wenuwen pahathin sandahan kara athi illim pilibandawa janadhipathiwarana apekshakayeku lesa obage pa්rathipaththimaya sthawara kawaredayi dana ganimata api kamaththemu.

ema sihinayada owunta nathiwa giya.
nadu katayuthu awasan wimen pasuwa mema gataluwata sadharana ha manushika hethu padanam karagena wisandumak labadimata kriyakarana bawada hethema kiweya.

sinamawe me maha pathaka yodhaya siya sahruda rawindrage ura thalayehi hisa howa iki bindimin handuwe ehi siti siyallanma so sayurehi gilwamini.sunil sarath pererage siya hadawatha randunu gi pada atharata sunil edirasinha gayana me githayata da wisheshathwayak himi weyi.ma ithin yanna yanawa mata yanna awasarayi mata aran yanna aththe ee mathakaya witharayi numbaa sandak wela paya mata eliya wunu wagayi numbaa sandak sema basa yayi mata ithiri kaluwarayi mage mathaka epamanayi sanda eliya ayithi lowatayi sanda ayithi ahasatayi pini kandulu bindu witharak me bimata watenu ayi mata ithiri epamanayi  gayanaya - sunil edirisinhageya pada - rathna shri wijesinhasangithaya - rohana wirasinhame githaya asena mohothak mohothak pasa mage hadawatha oba pilibanda sithuwilla hin dukak wi sparsha karana bawa oba danne nam, saroja, obage mathakaya sonduru kawi padayak se mage hitha ridawana ayuru numbaa danne nam, ma asalatama wi sitina bawa pamanak mama danimi.
